snippet.title: DracoFighter - LAUNCH TRAILER - Steam, Itch.io, Google Play
snippet.description:
DracoFighter is a solo-developed 2D fighting game with a focus on accessibility and local multiplayer, with movesets that are easy to learn but harder to master. Explore the stories of these hand-animated characters in a futuristic world led by dragons!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2027810/DracoFighter
Itch: https://vecderg.itch.io/dracofighter
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.godotengine.dracofighterfull

-------------------

HUGE thank you to https://twitter.com/SandwichDeer for making the trailer music!!

I'd also like to thank everyone who's supported me so far in working on my literal dream game. I appreciate it tons! This game was a passion project that was worked on for over 2 years, and I'm happy to have the game finally complete.
